attributes.action: Urgently overhaul the fishing quota system to save dumping perfectly good fish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC have just shown UK fisherman dumping dead fish because it is illegal to land them due to the fishing quota system. The fisherman was fishing for prawns but appeared to catch mostly cod. The quota system must be looked at urgently to stop the waste of perfectly good fish in an already overfished environment.
